headline: 1 Industrials Stock with Solid Fundamentals and 2 to Turn Down
summary: Even if they go mostly unnoticed, industrial businesses are the backbone of our country. Unfortunately, this role also comes with a demand profile tethered to the ebbs and flows of the broader economy, and investors seem to be forecasting a downturn - over the past six months, the industry has pulled back by 11.4%. This performance was worse than the S&P 500’s 2.1% loss.
